email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can bring the freight rate down to $51.00 per metric ton, which I believe is fair given the current market. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. However, we’d like to lock in the laycan as 15-18 October to avoid any delays. Can you confirm this? Also, please send over the full charter party for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed the laycan as 15-18 October. I’ll send over the charter party shortly. Just to recap, the agreed freight rate is $51.00 per metric ton, and the demurrage rate is $20,000 per day. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. We’ve reviewed the charter party and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed with the agreement. Please send over the final contract for signing. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ve attached the final contract for your review and signature. Once signed, we’ll proceed with the fixture. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working together. Best, Sarah
